text: Only Fools and Horses is a British comedy series sitcom. It is set in Peckham, south London. It was shown on BBC One and GOLD from 1981 to 2003. ==Cast== *David Jason as "Del Boy" *Nicholas Lyndhurst as Rodney *Buster Merryfield as Uncle Albert *Lennard Pearce as Grandad *Roger Lloyd Pack as Trigger *John Challis as Boycie *Tessa Peake-Jones as Raquel *Kenneth McDonald as Mike Fisher *Gwyneth Strong as Cassandra Trotter *Paul Barber as Denzil Tulser *Sue Holderness as Marlene Boyce *Patrick Murray as Mickey Pearce *Roy Heather as Sid *Jim Broadbent as Roy Slater *Benjamin Smith & Doulgas Hodge as Damien Trotter *Denis Lill as Alan Perry *Gerry Cowper as Lisa Category:1981 British television series debuts Category:2003 British television series endings Category:1980s British sitcoms Category:1990s British sitcoms Category:2000s British sitcoms Category:BBC television sitcoms Category:Television series about brothers Category:Television series about dysfunctional families Category:Television series set in London Category:English-language television programs
title: Only Fools and Horses
